MajorClaims.MC1: reducing stress by listening to music, playing sports, and doing meditation are easy and practical ways
MajorClaims.MC2: listening to music, exercising, and doing meditation are the most activities that people could do to escape from stress

Claims.C1: listening to music is a great way to relax
Claims.C2: another way that is perfectly work for everyone to reduce the stress is exercise
Claims.C3: meditation also one of the ways to reduce the stress
Claims.C4: It is are easy and usable
Claims.C5: And everyone should find the time to do more and more to feel better physically and in everyone mind

Premises.P1: I always listen music from my mp3 player
Premises.P2: I could enjoy listening music without thinking of people around me
Premises.P3: I feel happy when I listen music
Premises.P4: after work, I always do exercise, and jogging is my favorite sport
Premises.P5: I feel that after working out, I am easily to fall asleep
Premises.P6: Exercising not only reduce my stress but also make me get a good health
Premises.P7: Meditation is easy way to relax
Premises.P8: it is not require any equipment, and it take few minutes
Premises.P9: A way to do meditation is that I just sit down, close my eyes, and count my breath
Premises.P10: These could relieve me from stress
